aboutpara: I am responsible for creating the user interface and user experience of a website or application. This involves implementing designs provided by UI/UX designers, writing clean and efficient code using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and ensuring cross-browser compatibility. Collaborated with backend developers to integrate server-side logic and contribute to the overall functionality of the project. Responsible for optimizing applications for speed and responsiveness, troubleshoot and debug issues, and stay updated on emerging web technologies and best practices. Strong communication skills and an eye for design are often valuable in this role.
